attributes.action: Kids need a curfew & bring in the ARMY
attributes.additional_details:
August 2011.

KIDS rioting in our nationals capital, how pathetic, We all saw how stretched thevery thin blue line is.If thepolice cant handle the situation then bring in the boys that can! Bring in the ARMY.

I think that the parents of any child under the age of 18 that is caught loitering should receive a £1000 fine.

Its pretty clear that the police dont know what their doing when CHILDREN riot.

The whole world is looking at us and laughing. This is the messege you want to send? What hope have we got to host the 2012 olympics???
